author: Kirsten Korosec
title: Uber Eats customers have given $3 million in direct contributions to restaurants
description: Uber Eats customers have given $3 million in direct contributions to restaurants using a new feature on the app designed in response to the COVID-19 pandemic. The milestone caps off a related campaign by Uber Eats to match up to $3 million in contributions ma…
content:
Uber Eats customers have given $3 million in direct contributions to restaurants using a new feature on the app designed in response to the COVID-19 pandemic.
The milestone caps off a related campaign by Uber Eats to match up to $3 million in contributions m… [+3093 chars]
